note.query: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM [FU_EDW].[Dim_Calendar] WHERE Day_Filter_Flag = 0 AND Date_NM = DATEADD(DAY,-1,CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE));
note.title: [Notification] Calendar is not updated
note.body:
[FU_EDW].[Dim_Calendar]表今天没有更新，会影响到报表的日期。
可能需要如下手动处理：
Sample：
EXEC [Foodunion].[FU_EDW].[SP_Dim_Calendar]
note.returntable: SELECT TOP 1 Date_ID FROM [FU_EDW].[Dim_Calendar] WHERE Day_Filter_Flag = 1
